description: Demo content for Photography industry template - perfect for photographers, studios, and photography services

company.name: Lens & Light Photography
company.description: Professional photography services specializing in weddings, portraits, events, and commercial photography with a passion for storytelling through images.

hero.title: Lens & Light Photography
hero.subtitle: Professional photography services that capture the essence of your most precious moments. From intimate portraits to grand celebrations.
hero.alt: Beautiful wedding photography with golden hour lighting

portfolio.title: Featured Work
portfolio.subtitle: Explore our diverse portfolio of photography styles and specializations

featured_work.title: Romantic Garden Wedding
featured_work.description: Intimate outdoor ceremony captured during golden hour with natural lighting and candid moments.

featured_work.title: Corporate Headshots
featured_work.description: Professional executive portraits for LinkedIn and company websites with studio lighting.

featured_work.title: Newborn Photography
featured_work.description: Gentle, natural newborn portraits in the comfort of your home with soft, warm lighting.

featured_work.title: Product Photography
featured_work.description: Commercial product shots for e-commerce with clean backgrounds and professional lighting.

services.name: Wedding Photography
services.description: Complete wedding day coverage from getting ready to the last dance, including engagement sessions.

services.name: Portrait Sessions
services.description: Professional headshots, family portraits, and individual photography in studio or on location.

services.name: Event Photography
services.description: Corporate events, parties, and celebrations captured with professional equipment and editing.

services.name: Commercial Photography
services.description: Product photography, real estate, and commercial services for businesses and marketing.

about.title: About Lens & Light
about.description: With over a decade of experience, we specialize in capturing authentic moments and creating timeless images. Our approach combines technical expertise with artistic vision to tell your unique story.

process.title: Consultation
process.description: We discuss your vision, timeline, and specific photography needs to create a customized plan.

process.title: Planning
process.description: Detailed planning including location scouting, lighting setup, and timeline coordination.

process.title: Capture
process.description: Professional photography session with state-of-the-art equipment and expert techniques.

process.title: Editing & Delivery
process.description: Careful post-processing and delivery of high-resolution images in an online gallery.

testimonials.name: Emily & Michael Chen
testimonials.quote: Our wedding photos exceeded our expectations! Every moment was captured beautifully, and the attention to detail was incredible. We couldn't be happier with our choice.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.quote: Professional, punctual, and incredibly talented. The headshots turned out amazing and have really helped my personal branding. Highly recommend!

testimonials.name: TechStart Inc.
testimonials.quote: Outstanding commercial photography for our product launch. The images were exactly what we needed for our marketing campaign. Great communication throughout.

pricing.title: Photography Packages
pricing.subtitle: Transparent pricing with no hidden fees

packages.name: Essential
packages.description: Perfect for small events and simple sessions

packages.name: Professional
packages.description: Most popular choice for weddings and important events

packages.name: Premium
packages.description: Complete coverage with all the bells and whistles

contact.title: Let's Create Something Beautiful
contact.description: Ready to capture your special moments? Get in touch to discuss your photography needs and book your session.

booking.title: Book Your Session
booking.description: Check availability and schedule your photography session

footer.description: Professional photography services capturing life's beautiful moments since 2010.

seo.meta_description: Professional photography services in NYC. Wedding, portrait, event, and commercial photography. Capturing life's beautiful moments with artistic vision and technical excellence.
seo.keywords: photography, wedding photographer, portrait photography, event photography, commercial photography, NYC photographer
